fields.title: Ice Cream
fields.ingredients: 600ml Double Cream;6 Eggs;240g Caster Sugar;Flavourings of Choice
fields.method: Whip the cream until stiff.;Separate the egg yolks and egg whites.;Whip the egg whites until stiff.;Lightly whip the egg yolks, sugar, vanilla extract, and any liquid flavourings together.;Whip the egg yolk mixture lightly into the whipped cream.;Carefully fold together the cream mixture, whipped egg whites, and any solid flavourings.;Pour into a suitable container.;Freeze for at least 24 hours.

fields.title: Lamb Meatballs with Harissa Dressing
fields.ingredients: 500g Lamb Mince;80g Harissa Paste;1 Lemon;2 Garlic Cloves;10g Fresh Mint;60g Panko Breadcrumbs;1/2 Cucumber;2 Tablespoons Olive Oil;Natural Yoghurt (To Serve);Couscous (To Serve)
fields.method: Halve the cucumber lengthways.;Scape out cucumber seeds.;Slice the cucumber thinly.;Salt the cucumber and place in a sieve atop kitchen towel.;Zest the lemon.;Grate the garlic cloves.;Combine the lemon zest, garlic, breadcrumbs, and mince into ~20 meatballs.;Put meatballs in the oven, on a baking tray, at 200C for 15-20 minutes.;Combine harissa paste, olive oil, lemon juice, and mint into a marinade.;Rinse and dry cucumber.;Once meatballs are cooked, toss in marinade.;Serve meatballs atop couscous and topped with natural yoghurt and cucumber.

fields.title: Ricotta Gnocchi
fields.ingredients: 450g Ricotta;1 Large Egg;80g Grated Parmesan;150g Plain Flour;1/2 Teaspoon Nutmeg (Optional)
fields.method: Remove as much moisture from the ricotta as possible.;Sift flour into a large bowl.;Add all ingredients into the flour and mix until combined.;Gently knead dough until it comes together.;Roll the dough out into a long sausage shape.;Cut and shape the dough.;Boil in salted water for ~2 minutes.;Drain and serve.

fields.title: Chicken and Mushroom Pie
fields.ingredients: 8 Chicken Thigh Fillets (~640g);8 Rashers of Bacon;1 Onion;250g Mushrooms;Thyme Sprigs; 2 Tablespoons Flour;400ml Chicken Stock;200ml Milk;500g Puff Pastry;1 Egg (Optional)
fields.method: Cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces.;Fry the chicken.;Slice the onion.;Remove the chicken from the pan.;Fry the bacon.;Add the mushrooms, thyme, and onion to the bacon.;Continue frying until onion softens.;Stir in the flour until combined.;Stir in the stock and milk;Add the chicken back into the pan and simmer for 30 minutes.;Roll out the dough and line a deep pie dish. Enough dough should be left for a lid.;Fill the pie.;Top the pie with a pastry lid. Ensure the lid is bonded to the rest of the pastry and an air vent is cut into the top.;Optionally, apply an egg wash to the exposed pastry.;Bake for ~30 minutes at 200C.

fields.title: Beef Casserole
fields.ingredients: 850g Beef Pieces;2 Celery Sticks;1 Onion;2 Carrots;5 Bay Leaves;2 Thyme Sprigs;2 Tablespoons Plain Flour;2 Tablespoons Tomato Puree;2 Tablespoons Worcestershire Sauce;2 Beef Stock Cubes;Dumplings (Optional)
fields.method: Chop all vegetables into large chunks.;Fry until lightly softened.;Mix in flour.;Mix in stock cubes, tomato puree, and worcestershire sauce.;Boil water separately then add to the dish.;Add beef.;Bring to a simmer.;Place lid on dish and put in a 140C oven for 2.5 hours.;Make and add dumplings to the casserole.;Bake for a further 30 minutes without the lid.

fields.title: Liver and Chorizo on Toast
fields.ingredients: 250g Chicken Liver;150g Chorizo;1 Onion;2 Garlic Cloves;4 Tablespoons Double Cream;1 Tablespoon Parsley;2-3 Slices Thick Bread;Olive Oil (For Toasting)
fields.method: Fry chicken livers until mostly cooked. Break up liver using utensil as it cooks.;Slice onion.;Mince Garlic.;Add garlic and onion to liver and cook until softened.;Slice chorizo.;Add chorizo to pan.;In another pan, Toast bread with olive oil.;Add cream and parsley.;Serve topping on bread once liquid thickens.

fields.title: Sticky BBQ Chicken
fields.ingredients: 6-8 Chicken Thighs;6 Tablespoons Tomato Ketchup;2 Tablespoons Grainy Mustard;2 Tablespoons Worcestershire Sauce;2 Tablespoons Honey;2 Garlic Cloves;2 Tablespoons Tomato Puree (Optional)
fields.method: Crush Garlic.;Mix together all ingredients except for chicken thighs.;Spread a thin layer of sauce into ceramic dish.;Place chicken in dish, skin-side down.;Top with 75% of the remaining sauce.;Bake in a 200C oven for 20 minutes.;Take out of the oven, flip chicken, add remaining sauce to skin side.;Return to oven for another 20 minutes.

fields.title: Italian Crackslaw
fields.ingredients: 1 Green Cabbage;500g Beef Mince;1 Leek;2 Garlic Cloves;1 Tablespoon White Wine Vinegar;1 Teaspoon Onion Powder;2 Tablespoons Tomato Puree;20g Fresh Basil (Optional);Salt and Pepper (To Taste);Sour Cream or Mayonnaise (To Serve)
fields.method: Fry mince.;Add tomato puree to mince.;Chop cabbage.;Place mince to one side.;Fry cabbage in rendered beef fat until soft;Toss cabbage with vinegar, onion powder, salt, and pepper over heat.;Place mixture to one side.;Chop leeks.;Crush garlic.;Fry leeks and garlic.;Add all ingredients back into pan and mix together over heat.;Serve with sour cream or mayonnaise.

fields.title: Eggs in Purgatory
fields.ingredients: 400g Cherry Tomatoes;4 Eggs;2 Garlic Cloves;1/2 Teaspoon Chilli Flakes;50g Spinach;Olive Oil;Salt and Pepper (To Taste);Handful Fresh Basil (Optional)
fields.method: In a lidded casserole dish or large saucepan, heat cherry tomatoes with olive oil until soft.;Gently crush the tomatoes.;Stir in spinach.;Add chilli flakes and garlic.;Season with salt and pepper.;Crack eggs onto tomatoes.;Continue to cook with lid on, until egg whites cook.;Top with basil.;Serve on toasted bread or eat as a standalone dish.

fields.title: Cast Iron Pizza
fields.ingredients: 300g(?) Flour (Ideally Strong);200ml(?) Lukewarm Water;1 Sachet Dried Yeast;1/2 Teaspoon Salt;1/2 Tablespoon Sugar;4 Tablespoons Pizza Sauce (Ideally Homemade);150g Mozzarella (Ideally Low-Moisture);50-100g Cheddar Cheese;Toppings of Choice
fields.method: Dissolve sugar into water.;Add yeast and to water, leave to bloom.;If bloomed, continue. Else, retry with new yeast.;Mix salt into flour.;Add water mixture to flour.;Mix together until no clumps remain.;Leave for flour to hydrate for 15 minutes.;Knead dough for about 10 minutes and form into a ball.;Lightly cover dough in olive oil and leave in an oiled bowl to rise at room temperate until doubled in size or overnight in the fridge.;Place dough into a cold and oiled cast iron pan and lightly stretch out.;Let rest then continue stretching.;Repeat resting and stretching until the dough holds to the shape of the pan.;If using high-moisture mozzarella, drain and press between kitchen paper until drier.;Grate/chop cheeses.;Prepare toppings as appropriate;Spread pizza sauce over dough.;Arrange toppings onto dough.;Sprinkle cheeses over dough.;Put pan on medium-high heat on hob until base becomes firm (About 3-5 minutes).;Place into oven heated as high as possible for 10-15 minutes.

fields.title: Bacon and Leek Tart
fields.ingredients: 300g Puff Pastry;150-200g Soft Cheese;1 Leek;6-8 Rashers Bacon;100g Cheddar Cheese;Pepper (To Taste)
fields.method: If not pre-rolled, roll out pastry into the size of a baking tray.;Spread soft cheese evenly over the pastry.;Slice leek.;Sprinkle leek rings over pastry.;Cut bacon.;Arrange bacon over pastry.;Sprinkle pepper over tart.;Sprinkle cheddar over tart.;Fold edges over to form a crust.;Bake at 180C for ~20 minutes.;Brown cheese under grill if desired.

fields.title: Cookies
fields.ingredients: 100g Butter;60g Light Brown Sugar;60g Caster Sugar;1 Egg;150g Plain Flour;1 Teaspoon Vanilla Extract;Half Teaspoon Bicarbonate of Soda;Flavourings of Choice
fields.method: Soften butter in microwave for ~15 seconds.;Cream together butter and sugar.;Mix in egg and vanilla extract until smooth.;Mis in sifted flour and bicarbonate of soda until consistent.;Prepare and mix in flavourings.;Spoon onto a baking tray lined with baking paper.;Bake at 160C for 10-15 minutes.;Cool on a wire rack.

fields.title: Cast Iron Pineapple Upside-Down Cake
fields.ingredients: 60g Butter;125g Light Brown Sugar;1 Tin (~400g) Pineapple Slices;1 Maraschino Cherry per Pineapple Slice;2 Large Eggs;150g Caster Sugar;100g Flour;Half Teaspoon Baking Powder;Pinch of Salt
fields.method: Melt butter in cast iron pan.;Sprinkle brown sugar over base of pan evenly.;Drain pineapple slices from tin. Reserve 60ml of pineapple juice.;Arrange pineapple slices across base of pan.;Place a cherry (Halved if preferred) inside each of the pineapple centres.;Gently heat pineapple juice in a saucepan.;Separate eggs.;Beat egg yolks with a whisk until homogeneous.;Slowly add caster sugar to yolks while continuing to whisk.;Slowly whisk heated pineapple juice into yolk mixture.;Whisk in remaining dry ingredients into yolk mixture.;In a separate bowl, whip egg whites until stiff.;Carefully fold egg whites into batter.;Add batter to pan.;Bake at 160C for 45 minutes.;Let cool in pan for at least 30 minutes before flipping onto a plate/board.

fields.title: Turkey and Chickpea Burgers
fields.ingredients: 450g Turkey Mince;1 Can (~250g) Chickpeas;1/2 Onion;Salt and Pepper (To Season)
fields.method: Drain chickpeas.;Crush chickpeas into a rough paste.;Finely chop onion.;Mix together all ingredients.;Form into patties slightly larger than the desired final size.;Cook in an oiled frying pan for ~5 minutes on each side.;Serve on burger buns just like any other burger.

fields.title: Pork Belly Braise
fields.ingredients: 500g Pork Belly;1 Onion;1 Carrot;1 Celery Stick;2 Garlic Cloves;1 Teaspoon Fennel Seeds;100g Green Lentils;500g Vegetable Stock;2 Tablespoons Wholegrain Mustard;2 Tablespoons Honey;Salt and Pepper (To Season)
fields.method: If not already, cut pork belly into slices.;Liberally season the pork belly with salt and pepper.;Sear all sides of the pork belly in a casserole dish - ensure the fat is particularly browned.;Set aside the pork.;Add all vegetables and fennel seeds into the casserole dish and cook until beginning to soften.;Add lentils for the final minute.;Pour in the stock until the lentils are covered.;Lay pork on top.;Cook in a 160C oven, covered, for 45 minutes.;Mix honey and mustard together.;Glaze pork with mixture.;Return to oven uncovered for a further 40 minutes.;Top up with more stock if it runs dry.;Re-glaze the pork frequently while cooking.

fields.title: Thai Green Fish Curry
fields.ingredients: 350g Fish Pie Mix;3 Tablespoons Thai Green Curry Paste;400ml Coconut Milk/Cream;200g Green Beans;500ml Stock (Fish or Vegetable);1 Tablespoon Coriander Leaves;1 Red Chilli;150g Spinach;1 Teaspoon Fish Sauce;2 Tablespoons Lemon Juice;1 Tablespoon Olive Oil;200g Rice
fields.method: Cook rice.;In a large saucepan, lightly fry the curry paste, beans, coriander, and chilli.;Pour in the stock and fish sauce.;Bring to a simmer.;Add the fish and simmer until cooked through.;Stir in the coconut milk (cream for a thicker sauce), lemon, and spinach.;Serve on rice.

fields.title: Toad in the Hole
fields.ingredients: 12 Chipolatas;140g Plain Flour;2 Eggs;175ml Milk;1/2 Teaspoon Salt
fields.method: Cook sausages in an oiled ceramic rectangular baking dish in a 200C oven for 15 minutes.;While cooking, whisk together flour, eggs, milk, and salt.;Immediately from the oven, pour the batter evenly over the sausages.;Return to the oven for a further 25 minutes.

fields.title: Pork Belly Bao
fields.ingredients: 10g Ginger;2 Chillies;2 Garlic Cloves;1 Orange;1l Chicken Stock;1 Cinnamon Stick;2 Star Anise;1kg Pork Belly;500g Plain Flour;50g Caster Sugar;1 Teaspoon Salt;1 Teaspoon Baking Powder;1 Teaspoon Dried Yeast;150ml Water;100ml Milk;50ml Double Cream;3 Tablespoons Vegetable Oil;1 Tablespoon Sesame Oil;4 Tablespoons Honey;2 Tablespoons Light Soy Sauce;1 Tablespoon Rice Wine Vinegar;2 Tablespoons Sesame Seeds
fields.method: De-seed (If desired) and slice the chillies.;Peel and slice the ginger.;Crush the garlic.;Quarter the orange.;To a very large saucepan - add the chillies, ginger, orange, garlic, star anise, cinnamon, chicken stock, and pork belly.;Cover and simmer as low as possible for 2 hours.;After 30 minutes of simmering, mix together the flour, yeast, salt, baking powder, sugar, water, milk, and cream until it forms a dough.;Knead the dough for 10 minutes.;Form dough into a ball.;Oil the dough ball and its container lightly.;Let dough prove for 1 hour.;Separate dough into 75g balls.;Roll each miniature ball into an oval.;Lightly oil the side facing up and fold over on itself.;Let uncooked buns prove for 20 more minutes.;Meanwhile, remove pork from broth.;Chop pork into bitesized pieces.;Lightly fry the pork in an oiled frying pan until browned.;Remove any excessive oil in the pan.;Add honey, soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, and 100ml of the broth.;Cook until the pork mixture reaches a saucy consistency.;Arrange three bao buns onto a small plate lined with baking paper in a single layer.;Place plate into broth saucepan atop a tall bowl.;Steam buns in the saucepan for 20 minutes.;Repeat the steaming process for remaining buns.;Fill buns with pork and sprinkle filling with sesame seeds to serve.

fields.title: Italian Stuff on Toasted Bread
fields.ingredients: Bread (Any nice loaf);1 Ball Mozzarella;1 Large Tomato;Handful of Fresh Basil;Olive Oil;Salt and Pepper (To Season)
fields.method: Pre-heat a pan large enough to accommodate all bread slices (ideally a cast iron pan).;Add a small amount of olive oil to the pan.;Drizzle olive oil onto 1 side of the bread.;Toast the bread, oil side down, until golden.;Repeat for second side of bread.;Slice mozzarella and tomato into equal numbers of slices to top the bread.;Arrange stacks of toppings onto bread: tomato, mozzarella, then a basil leaf.;Finish with a drizzle of olive oil and salt and pepper.

fields.title: Chicken Kebabs
fields.ingredients: 1 Chicken Breast;1 Pepper;1 Onion;1 Tablespoon Soy Sauce;1 Tablespoon Olive Oil;1 Tablespoon Dried Oregano;1/2 Tablespoon Lemon Juice;1 Garlic Clove
fields.method: Mix together the soy sauce, olive oil, oregano, lemon juice, and garlic.;Cut up chicken breasts, pepper, and onion into cubes/squares.;Mix all ingredients together.;Optionally, marinade for up to 24 hours.;Arrange onto skewers in a repeating pattern of pepper, onion, and chicken.;Suspend skewers from each end bake at 200C for 25 minutes, flipping halfway through.

fields.title: Basic Curry
fields.ingredients: 400g Chicken Breast or Thigh;400g Chopped Tomatoes;2 Tablespoons Curry Powder;2 Garlic Cloves;100g Natural Yoghurt;1 Onion;2 Tablespoons Brown Sugar;Rice (To Serve);Coriander Leaf (To Serve)
fields.method: Begin cooking some rice.;Cut up the chicken into pieces.;Cut up the onion into large squares.;Fry the chicken in a large frying pan until almost cooked.;Add the curry powder to the chicken and cook until fragrant.;Add the onion.;Before the spices burn, add the chopped tomatoes and garlic.;Cook until the sauce is beginning to thicken.;Stir in the natural yoghurt.;Serve on rice, topped with coriander leaf.

fields.title: Vegetarian Duck Pancakes
fields.ingredients: 1 Tin (~400g) Jackfruit;4 Spring Onions;1/2 Cucumber;2 Teaspoons Chinese Five Spice;2 Teaspoons Rice Wine Vinegar;3 Garlic Cloves;3 Tablespoons Soy Sauce;2 Teaspoons Sesame Oil;~5 Chinese Pancakes;3 Tablespoons Hoisin Sauce (Plus more to serve)
fields.method: Drain jackfruit.;Slice 2 of the spring onions.;Lightly fry the spring onions and garlic.;Add in jackfruit, five spice, sesame oil, rice wine vinegar, and hoisin sauce.;Continue to cook for ~10 minutes whilst breaking up jackfruit.;Lay jackfruit mixture flat on a baking tray and cook in the oven for 20 minutes at 200C.;While jackfruit is in the oven, slice cucumber and remaining spring onions into sticks.

fields.title: Chicken and Bacon Cheesy Pasta
fields.ingredients: 300g Chicken Breast;200g Bacon;150g Tagliatelle;150g Mascarpone;75g Blue Cheese;2 Garlic Cloves;1 Onion;2 Teaspoons Thyme;Salt and Pepper (To Taste)
fields.method: Cook pasta in salted water.;Dice chicken and bacon.;Fry chicken until almost browned.;Add bacon and cook through.;Roughly chop and add onion.;Crush and add garlic.;Add cheeses, thyme, and pasta.;If too dry, add additional pasta water.

fields.title: Cornflake Cakes
fields.ingredients: 150g Cornflakes;200g Chocolate;2 Tablespoons Golden Syrup;50g Butter;Toppings
fields.method: Combine and melt the chocolate, golden syrup, and butter in a double boiler.;Gently stir in cornflakes.;Fill cupcake cases with mixture.;Add toppings.

fields.title: Aubergine Bake
fields.ingredients: 1 Aubergine;250g Passata;150g Fresh Mozzarella;100g Cherry Tomatoes;2 Tablespoons Green Pesto;1 Pepper;2 Tablespoons Double Cream;1 Tablespoon Balsamic Vinegar;3 Tablespoons Olive Oil;1 Tablespoon Dried Basil;1 Tablespoon Parsley;1 Tablespoon Thyme
fields.method: In a large baking dish, mix together the passata, pesto, cream, vinegar, herbs, and half of the olive oil.;Cut the tips off of the aubergine and halve length-ways.;Cut 3 v-shaped slits across each aubergine half.;Place aubergine into the dish.;Stuff the slits with slices of mozzarella and slices of pepper.;Drizzle aubergine with remaining olive oil.;Add halved cherry tomatoes around the aubergine.;Bake at 180C for ~30 minutes.;Eat as-is or serve on toasted bread.

fields.title: Lasagne
fields.ingredients: 500g Beef Mince;1 Large Onion;1 Pepper;500g Passata;1 Tablespoon Dried Basil;2 Garlic Cloves;2 Teaspoons Worcestershire Sauce;150g Shredded Mozzarella;50g Butter;50g Plain Flour;500ml Milk;9 Lasagne Sheets
fields.method: Finely chop onion and pepper.;Crush garlic.;Fry mince.;Add onion and pepper.;Add passata, garlic, basil, and worcestershire sauce.;Simmer for ~10 minutes until slightly thickened.;If using dried lasagne sheets, soak sheets in cold salted water.;Melt butter in a saucepan.;Whisk flour into butter.;Slowly stream milk into butter/flour mixture.;Continue to heat and whisk white sauce until thickened.;Build up lasagne in a lasagne dish in layers of: meat-sauce, lasagne sheets, white sauce.;Top with mozzarella.;Bake at 180C for ~40 minutes.;Brown cheese under grill.

fields.title: Cast Iron Giant Cookie
fields.ingredients: 250g Butter;200g Brown Sugar;100g Caster Sugar;2 Eggs;1 Teaspoon Vanilla Extract;250g Plain Flour;1 Teaspoon Bicarbonate of Soda;1/2 Teaspoon Salt;250g Chocolate;Other Flavourings
fields.method: Melt butter in cast iron pan.;Dissolve both sugars into the butter.;Remove from heat and let stand for 15-30 minutes.;Whisk in eggs and vanilla extract.;Stir in flour, bicarbonate of soda, and salt.;Chop chocolate and other toppings into large chunks and stir into mixture.;Level mixture.;Bake at 160C for ~25 minutes.

fields.title: Chicken Stock
fields.ingredients: 1 Chicken Carcass;~5 Celery Sticks;1 Large Onion;6 Garlic Cloves;2 Tablespoons Parsley (Ideally Fresh);2 Tablespoons Thyme (Ideally Fresh);Handful of Peppercorns;Other Aromatic Vegetables
fields.method: Very roughly chop vegetables.;Throw all ingredients into a large pan.;Barely cover with water.;Simmer for 3-4 hours.;Skim and strain through a colander.

fields.title: Korean Stir-Fried Chicken
fields.ingredients: 400g Chicken Thighs;3 Tablespoons Gochujang;1 Onion;4 Spring Onions;1 Tablespoon Light Soy Sauce;1 Tablespoon Sugar;1/2 Teaspoon Pepper;2cm Ginger;3 Garlic Cloves;1 Tablespoon Sesame Oil;Sesame Seeds (To Garnish);Rice (To Serve)
fields.method: Cook the rice.;Cut up the chicken into pieces.;Mix together the chicken, gochujang, soy sauce, sugar, pepper, and sesame oil.;Optionally, let the mixture marinade.;In a frying pan or wok, cook the chicken mixture.;Slice the onion.;Peel and crush the garlic and ginger.;Cut the spring onion into large diagonal wedges.;Add the remaining ingredients to the mixture for the final 5 minutes.;Serve mixture on rice.;Garnish with sesame seeds.

fields.title: Kimchi Pancake
fields.ingredients: 150g Kimchi;75g Plain Flour;1 Teaspoon Caster Sugar;50g Water;3 Spring Onions
fields.method: Roughly chop spring onions and kimchi (if not already).;Mix all ingredients together.;Pour into and fry in a frying pan with oil for ~3 minutes each side.

fields.title: Harissa Sea Bass with Griddled Vegetables
fields.ingredients: 1 Sea Bass Fillet;1 Teaspoon Harissa Paste;1 Courgette;1 Pepper;1 Onion;Salt and Pepper (To Season)
fields.method: Cut courgette into ribbons using a vegetable peeler.;Cut pepper and onion into large wedges.;Fry vegetables in a hot (Ideally griddled) pan until soft and charred.;Dry sea bass.;Rub harissa, salt, and pepper over sea bass.;Grill sea bass under high heat for ~5 minutes.

fields.title: Rosti
fields.ingredients: 2 Large Potatoes;1/2 Teaspoon Salt;1/4 Teaspoon Pepper;1 Teaspoon Paprika;1 Onion (Optional)
fields.method: Peel and grate potatoes and onion.;Drain as much water out by squeezing through a tea towel.;Mix all ingredients together.;Firmly pack mixture into a large oiled saucepan.;Cook for ~5 minutes each side.

fields.title: Italian Meatballs and Sauce
fields.ingredients: 500g Beef Mince;50g Panko Breadcrumbs;1 Egg;2 Tablespoons Oregano;2 Tablespoons Basil;1 Teaspoon Salt;500g Passata;1 Large Onion;2 Cloves Garlic
fields.method: Mix together mince, breadcrumbs, egg, 1 tablespoon oregano, 1 tablespoon basil, and 1/2 teaspoon salt.;Form mixture into ~15 balls.;Evenly fry in an oiled frying pan until cooked through.;Remove meatballs from frying pan, but leave the oil.;Finely chop the onion.; Mince the garlic.;Fry the onion and garlic.;Drain some oil if there is too much.;Combine all remaining ingredients.;Cook on low heat until beginning to thicken.;Return meatballs to the frying pan and continue cooking until sauce is at desired thickness.;Serve on either spaghetti or in bread rolls.

fields.title: Lamb and Apricot Tagine
fields.ingredients: 600g Diced Lamb;2 Onions;2 Cloves Garlic;200g Butternut Squash;200g Dried Apricots;1 Can Chopped Tomatoes;500ml Lamb/Beef Stock;1.5 Tablespoons Ras-El-Hanout;1 Teaspoon Ground Coriander;Couscous (To Serve)
fields.method: Dice squash.;In a casserole dish, fry the onions.;Once mostly fried, add spices and garlic.;Continue to cook for ~1 minute.;Add all other ingredients.;Mix whilst bringing to the boil.;Add lid and cook in a 200C oven for 1 hour.;Stir, remove lid, and cook for a further 30 minutes.;Serve on couscous.

fields.title: Sourdough Starter Crumpet
fields.ingredients: 100g Sourdough Starter;Fresh Rosemary;Pinch Salt Flakes;1 Tablespoon Olive Oil
fields.method: Heat a small frying pan containing 1/2 tablespoon olive oil.;Pour sourdough starter into centre of pan.; Cook until the top edges begins to solidify and the crumpet slides freely on the pan.;Sprinkle rosemary and salt onto the top of the crumpet.;Flip.;Cook for a further 1-2 minutes.;Flip again.;Turn off heat.;Lightly drizzle with remaining olive oil.

fields.title: Peach Galette
fields.ingredients: 250g Plain Flour;100g Butter;100g Caster Sugar;1/2 Teaspoon Salt;800g Tinned Peaches;1 Egg;2 Tablespoons Light Brown or Demerara Sugar
fields.method: Dump all flour, butter, sugar, and salt onto a large chopping board.;Cut ingredients together until butter is crumb-sized.;Drain peaches into a sieve, reserving the liquid.;Add 50ml of peach liquid to mixture.;Bring mixture together into a dough without heating it up too much with hands.;Wrap dough in clingfilm and rest in the freezer for 30 minutes.;Sprinkle peaches with sugar to desired sweetness and leave whilst dough is cooling.;Roll dough out into a circle of 1/2cm thickness.;Transfer dough to baking paper.;Arrange peaches into centre of dough, leaving about 1/3 of the radius uncovered.;Fold edge towards centre along the entire circumference.;Crack and beat an egg.;Liberally apply egg-wash to the exposed dough.;Sprinkle sugar over galette.;Transfer to a baking tray.;Bake in 180C oven for 1 hour.;Allow to cool for at least 15 minutes before cutting.

fields.title: Puff Pastry Cinnamon Rolls
fields.ingredients: 250g Puff Pastry;2 Tablespoons Butter;65g Brown Sugar;15g Caster Sugar;1 Tablespoon Cinnamon;100g Icing Sugar;1 Tablespoon Milk;1 Teaspoon Vanilla Extract
fields.method: Roll out pastry into a rectangle of 0.5cm thickness.;Mix together brown sugar, caster sugar, and cinnamon.;Melt butter.;Brush melted butter evenly across the pastry.;Spread sugar mixture evenly across the pastry.;Cut pastry into 3cm strips.;Roll strips.;Place flat on a baking tray lined with baking paper.;Lightly press down on rolls.;Bake at 180C for 20 minutes.;Make glaze by mixing remaining ingredients.;Let rolls cool.;Glaze rolls.

fields.title: Schnitzel
fields.ingredients: 2-3 Chicken/Pork/Turkey Fillets;75g Panko Breadcrumbs;75g Plain Flour;2 Eggs;1 Tablespoon Paprika;1 Tablespoon Garlic Powder;1 Teaspoon Salt;1 Teaspoon Pepper
fields.method: Flatten meat in plastic.;Mix together flour, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.;Whisk eggs together.;Bread meat by coating in flour mixture, then eggs, then breadcrumbs.;Shallow fry in a deep frying pan for ~5 minutes each side until golden brown.;Cool on a wire rack above kitchen roll.

fields.title: Seasoned Sushi Rice
fields.ingredients: 250g Sushi Rice;3 Tablespoons Rice Wine Vinegar;2 Tablespoons Caster Sugar;1 Teaspoon Salt
fields.method: Thoroughly wash the rice.;Add rice to lidded-saucepan with 330ml of water.;Simmer for 10 minutes.;Leave to stand, with the lid on, for 30 minutes.;Mix together remaining ingredients.;Gently fold all ingredients together.

fields.title: Japanese Mayonnaise Substitute
fields.ingredients: 200g Mayonnaise;2 Tablespoons Rice Wine Vinegar;1 Tablespoon Caster Sugar;MSG (Optional / To Taste)
fields.method: Mix all ingredients together thoroughly.

fields.title: Orange Lamb Stir-Fry
fields.ingredients: 500g Lamb Mince;2 Garlic Cloves;1 Large Onion;2 Oranges;2 Tablespoons Light Soy Sauce;1 Teaspoon Cumin Seeds;1 Teaspoon Ground Coriander;1 Teaspoon Chives;Salt, Pepper, and MSG (To Taste)
fields.method: Fry lamb mince in a large saucepan or wok.;Grate garlic.;Slice onion.;Zest oranges.;Peel and segment one orange.;Juice the other orange.;Add garlic, cumin seeds, coriander, and onion.;Continue cooking until onion has began to soften.;Add all remaining ingredients.;Continue to cook for ~5 minutes.

fields.title: Pancakes
fields.ingredients: 1 Egg;100ml Milk;50g Plain Flour;1 Teaspoon Oil
fields.method: Whisk all ingredients together.;Cook in a small frying pan for ~3 minutes, flipping halfway through.;Add toppings of choice (e.g. banana, chocolate spread, honey, or ice cream).

fields.title: Chicken and Chorizo Traybake
fields.ingredients: 8 Chicken Thigh Fillets (~640g);250g Cherry Tomatoes;200g Whole Chorizo;2 Peppers;100g Pitted Green Olives;1 Teaspoon Chilli Flakes;1 Lemon;10g Fresh Basil;5 Tablespoons Olive Oil;Salt and Pepper (To season)
fields.method: Remove casing from chorizo.;Cut chorizo into thick rings.;Slice peppers into chunks.;Add Chicken, tomatoes, chorizo, peppers, and chilli flakes to a large roasting dish.;Drizzle with olive oil.;Season with salt and pepper.;Bake at 180C for 30 minutes.;Mix.;Bake for a further 20 minutes.;Mix in olives.;Bake for a final 10 minutes.;Chop basil.;Juice lemon.;Mix together remaining olive oil, lemon juice, and basil.;Dress traybake with dressing.

fields.title: Enchiladas
fields.ingredients: ~500g Chicken Breasts;3 Large Tortillas;500g Passata;1 Onion;2 Tablespoons Plain Flour;1 Tablespoon Cumin;1 Tablespoon Paprika;1 Tablespoon Oregano;2 Teaspoons Garlic Powder;1 Teaspoon Onion Powder;1 Teaspoon Salt;1/2 Teaspoon Pepper;250g Cheddar Cheese
fields.method: Cut chicken into bitesize pieces.;Chop onion into large pieces.;Fry chicken until almost cooked.;Mix together all seasonings, flour, and passata.;Add onions to chicken.;Add 3/4 of the sauce to chicken.;Add 1/2 of the cheese to the mixture.;Simmer until cheese is fully melted and sauce begins to thicken.;Lightly oil baking dish.;Distribute filling among all tortillas evenly.;Fold tortillas around filling using excess sauce to seal the end shut.;Grate cheese over dish.;Bake at 180C until cheese beginning to brown.

fields.title: Spinach and Feta Pie
fields.ingredients: 350g Frozen Spinach;200g Feta Cheese;500g Puff Pastry;1 Tablespoon Olive Oil;1 Tablespoon Sesame Seeds;1 Onion;2 Teaspoons Lemon Juice;20g Butter;Salt and Pepper (To Taste)
fields.method: Dice onion.;Fry onion lightly.;Add spinach.;Cook until spinach melted.;Remove mixture from heat and sprinkle in feta chunks.;Lightly mix mixture together with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.;Roll the pastry out such that it can line a large baking dish with enough off-cuts for a lid.;Lightly oil baking dish.;Line baking dish with pastry.;Add filling.;Remove excess pastry from edges leaving enough overhang to help seal lid onto it.;Roll out offcuts into a lid.;Drape lid over pie.;Seal lid and tidy any overhang.;Cut several small steam vents into lid.;Melt butter.;Brush butter over lid.;Sprinkle sesame seeds over pie.;Bake at 170C for 30 minutes.

fields.title: Pork Larb
fields.ingredients: 500g Pork Mince;300g Rice;20g Fresh Mint;20g Fresh Coriander;1 Red Chilli;4 Spring Onions;4 Tablespoons Fish Sauce;1 Tablespoon Lemon Juice;2 Limes;1 Lettuce
fields.method: Cook rice.;Finely chop mint and coriander.;De-seed and slice chilli.;Thickly cut spring onions.;Separate and wash lettuce leaves.;Quarter limes.;Fry mince in a wok.;Add spring onions and chilli.;De-glaze with fish sauce, lemon juice, and juice from 1 lime.;Add all remaining ingredients (including any lime rinds) except for lettuce.;Lightly cook until all ingredients hot.;Serve on lettuce leaves.

fields.title: Oatmeal Raisin Cookies
fields.ingredients: 115g Butter;100g Brown Sugar;25g Caster Sugar;1 Egg;1/2 Tablespoon Vanilla Extract;95g Plain Flour;1/2 Teaspoon Bicarbonate of Soda;1 Teaspoon Cinnamon;1/4 Teaspoon Salt;120g Oats;70g Raisins;1/2 Tablespoon Molasses
fields.method: Soak raisins in warm water for at least 10 minutes.;Soften butter.;Cream together butter and both sugars.;Mix in egg, vanilla extract, and molasses.;In a separate bowl, mix together the flour, bicarbonate of soda, cinnamon, and salt.;Combine both bowls to form a dough.;Drain and thoroughly dry raisins.;Fold raisins and oats into dough.;Form dough into balls using ~2 tablespoons of dough each.;Bake on a baking tray at 180C for ~12 minutes.

fields.title: Baguette Pizza
fields.ingredients: 1 Baguette;4 Tablespoons Tomato Puree;1 Tablespoon BBQ Sauce;150g Cheddar Cheese;2 Teaspoons Dried Basil;1 Teaspoon Pepper;Toppings of Choice
fields.method: Prepare toppings as necessary.;Cut baguette to the length of a baking tray.;Halve baguette length-ways.;Mix together BBQ sauce and tomato puree.;Spread mixture over baguette halves.;Add toppings.;Sprinkle over pepper.;Sprinkle over cheese.;Sprinkle over basil.;Drip over additional BBQ sauce.;Bake at 180C for 5 minutes.;Grill until cheese is golden.

fields.title: Winged Dumplings
fields.ingredients: 6 Frozen Dumplings;1 Teaspoon Cornflour;1 Teaspoon Plain Flour;75ml water
fields.method: Arrange dumplings on an oiled non-stick frying pan as a spiral.;Bring up to a medium heat.;Mix together flours and water.;Pour flour mixture into pan.;Cover with lid and fry until browned.

fields.title: Tuna Pasta Bake
fields.ingredients: 350g Pasta;3 Tins (~300g) Tuna Chunks;150g Sweetcorn;50g Butter;50g Plain Flour;500ml Milk;300g Cheddar Cheese;1 Tablespoon Pepper
fields.method: Cook pasta.;Melt butter in saucepan.;Add flour.;Whisk together, on heat, for ~3 minutes.;Slowly add milk while whisking.;Grate cheese.;Add 1/2 of cheese to sauce.;Mix together all ingredients except for remaining cheese.;Add mixture to baking dish.;Sprinkle remaining cheese over mixture.;Bake at 200C for ~20 minutes.

fields.title: Chocolate Coconut Tart
fields.ingredients: 180g Plain Flour;140g Caster Sugar;170g Coconut Oil;250ml Coconut Cream;200g Chocolate;1 Tablespoon Honey;1 Teaspoon Vanilla Extract;1/2 Teaspoon Salt
fields.method: Mix together flour, sugar, salt, and coconut oil into a breadcrumb texture.;Line a tart pan with mixture.;Blind bake crust at 180C for 25 minutes.;Let crust cool.;Add all remaining ingredients except for the chocolate into a microwavable container.;Add enough chocolate such that the total volume reaches 500ml.;Gently heat the mixture in the microwave until chocolate melts fully.;Stir ganache.;Pour ganache into crust and let cool fully before serving.

fields.title: Meatloaf
fields.ingredients: 500g 10-15% Fat Minced Beef;1 Onion;1 Egg;3 Garlic Cloves;120g Ketchup;3 Tablespoons Parsley;45g Panko Breadcrumbs;75ml Milk;2 Teaspoons Salt;2 Teaspoons Oregano;2 Teaspoons Basil;1 Teaspoon Pepper;1 Teaspoon White Wine Vinegar;2 Tablespoons Brown Sugar;1 Teaspoon Garlic Powder;1 Teaspoon Onion Powder
fields.method: Finely dice onion and garlic.;Mix together mince, onion, garlic, egg, parsley, panko, milk, oregano, basil, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, 1.5 teaspoons salt, and 100g ketchup.;Press mixture into a loaf tin lined with baking paper.;Bake at 200C for 40 minutes.;Mix together all remaining ingredients.;Glaze top of meatloaf with sauce.;Return to oven for 15 additional minutes.

fields.title: Burritos
fields.ingredients: 4 Tortillas;100g Rice;1 Pepper;1 Onion;100g Kidney Beans;100g Cheddar Cheese;100g Salsa;100g Guacamole;100g Sour Cream;Meat Filling of Choice (e.g. Pulled Pork/Chicken, Spiced Mince Beef);1 Tablespoon Fajita Seasoning;20ml Lime Juice
fields.method: Cook rice.;Stir in lime juice.;Slice onion and pepper.;Grate cheese.;Fry onions and peppers until browned.;Season onions and peppers with fajita seasoning.;Lay down four squares of foil.;Microwave tortillas for ~20 seconds.;Lay one tortilla on each of the foil squares.;Add all ingredients to tortilla.;Wrap up burrito.;Repeat for all burritos.;Place burritos on a baking tray.;Bake at 180C for ~20 minutes.

fields.title: Calzone
fields.ingredients: 200g Strong Flour;~150ml Milk/Water;5g Yeast;2 Teaspoons Salt;3 Garlic Cloves;25g Butter;200g Passata;1 Tablespoon Oregano;1 Tablespoon Basil;2 Teaspoons Olive Oil;2 Teaspoon Sugar;75g Mozzarella;Fillings of Choice
fields.method: Knead together flour, milk/water, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon sugar, and yeast.;Let dough rise for 4-6 hours.;Mix together passata, 1 garlic clove; oregano, basil, 1 teaspoon salt, sugar, and olive oil.;Reduce sauce until slightly thickened.;Shape dough into a circle.;Spread a layer of sauce over all of the dough.;Arrange fillings on half of the dough.;Top fillings with cheese and more sauce.;Fold dough over fillings and seal.;Transfer to baking vessel.;Bake at maximum oven temperature for ~10 minutes.;Melt butter.;Mince garlic.;Mix together butter and garlic.;Baste calzone with garlic butter.;Return to oven until golden brown.

fields.title: Apple Galette
fields.ingredients: 200g Strong Flour;~150ml Milk;5g Yeast;1 Teaspoons Salt;4 Golden Delicious Apples;5g Sugar;6 Tablespoons Sugar;25g Butter;100g Apricot Jam
fields.method: Knead together flour, milk/water, 1 teaspoon sugar, 1 teaspoon salt, and yeast.;Let dough rise for 4-6 hours.;Peel, core, and slice apples.;Line baking tray with baking paper.;Sprinkle ~2 tablespoons of sugar evenly across the paper.;Spread dough out to the size of the baking tray.;Arrange apples across dough.;Sprinkle with remaining sugar.;Sprinkle with cinnamon.;Distribute chunks of butter across galette.;Bake at 190C for 30 minutes.;Glaze with apricot jam.

fields.title: Banana Bread
fields.ingredients: 1 Very Ripe Banana;75g Plain Flour;75g Caster Sugar;50g Butter;1 Egg;1 Tablespoon Milk;1/2 Teaspoon Bicarbonate of Soda;1/2 Teaspoon Baking Powder
fields.method: Grease loaf tin.;Line loaf tin with baking paper.;Soften butter in microwave for ~5 seconds.;Mash banana in a mixing bowl.;Add all other ingredients to bowl.;Thoroughly mix together all ingredients.;Bake at 140C for 45 minutes.

fields.title: Chocolate Chilli
fields.ingredients: 500g Beef Mince;2 Peppers;1 Brown Onion;2-3 Red Chillies;2 Garlic Cloves;400g Kidney Beans;800g Chopped Tomatoes;60g Dark Chocolate;2 Teaspoons Paprika;2 Teaspoons Cumin;2 Teaspoons Oregano;1 Teaspoon Sugar;1 Tablespoon Coriander Leaf; Salt and Pepper (To Taste)
fields.method: Finely chop onion, pepper, chilli, and garlic.;Fry mince in casserole dish.;Remove mince from dish.;Fry chopped ingredients in leftover beef fat.;Reintroduce beef alongside cumin, paprika, oregano, sugar, drained kidney beans, and chopped tomatoes.;Simmer with lid ajar for ~30 minutes until thickened.;Add chocolate and coriander.;Stir once chocolate melted.;Add salt and pepper to taste.

fields.title: Grilled Cheese
fields.ingredients: 2 Slices Sandwich Bread;50g Cheddar Cheese;1 Teaspoon Garlic Powder;1 Teaspoon Paprika;1 Tablespoon Mayonnaise;10g Butter;1/2 Teaspoon Pepper
fields.method: Grate cheese.;Spread mayonnaise across entirely of one side of each slice of bread.;Flip one slice upside-down.;Arrange cheese on dry side of flipped bread.;Sprinkle garlic powder, paprika, and pepper evenly across cheese.;Top with other slice of bread so that both mayonnaise sides are facing outwards.;Melt butter in a frying pan.;Fry each side until golden brown.

fields.title: Baked Salmon
fields.ingredients: 2 Salmon Fillets;1 Teaspoon Lemon Juice;2 Teaspoons Olive Oil;1/2 Teaspoon Pepper
fields.method: Grease a sheet of foil with some of the olive oil.;Place salmon fillet on foil, skin-side down.;Drizzle fillet with lemon juice and remaining olive oil.;Sprinkle fillet with pepper.;Bake at 180C for 15 minutes.
